Name: Vladimir Gloval
Details: Precentor Delta Vladimir Vladimirovich Gloval is a senior officer of the Manei Domini, the elite military organization of the Word of Blake. Left a paraplegic after being severely wounded at the Battle of Tukayyid, the Blakists fitted him with cybernetic implants that allowed him to regain full use of his body — while thoroughly indoctrinating him in the Word. Like all members of the Manei Domini, he is brutal, capricious, and utterly devoted to his cause.
